channel.title: Need help with adding some new models plz help ill rep+++
channel.description:
okay. i added some new models ( max cape, completitioniste , classic cape , veteran cape ) i added all the int in itemdef.java ( client side ) i added the item name and description in item.cfg now when im spawning the item.. and trying to wear it.. nothing happend.. i cant wear them.. i rigth-click on them and click on wear then nothing happend
plz help me.. someone know wher ei maybe made a mistake or i forgot something to do? please.. thanks in advance . cedrick

item.title: Need help with adding some new models plz help ill rep+++
item.dc:creator: @cedrick cedrick
item.description:
@cedrick wrote:

okay. i added some new models ( max cape, completitioniste , classic cape , veteran cape )
i added all the int in itemdef.java ( client side )
i added the item name and description in item.cfg
now when im spawning the item… and trying to wear it… nothing happend… i cant wear them…
i rigth-click on them and click on wear then nothing happend

plz help me…
someone know wher ei maybe made a mistake or i forgot something to do?
please…
thanks in advance .
cedrick
